generated.css: *{box-sizing:border-box;padding:0;margin:0}html{font-family:Comfortaa,cursive}a{text-decoration:none}body{position:relative}nav{height:56px;padding-top:.25em}nav .brand-logo,nav .nav-wrapper{height:100%;display:flex}nav .brand-logo{font-weight:700;color:#000;font-size:22px;align-items:center;cursor:pointer}nav .brand-logo img{height:100%}nav .brand-logo span{width:150px;display:inline-block;padding-left:8px;margin-top:8px}nav .flex-filler{flex-basis:100%}nav .menu-button{height:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:center;margin-right:16px}nav .menu-button div{width:36px;height:4px;margin:0 4px 6px;border-radius:4px;background-color:#263238}.stories-container{width:90%;margin:16px auto}.top-stories-title,.user-stories-title{font-size:28px;font-weight:700;color:#263238;text-decoration:underline}.story-container{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;margin-bottom:36px;margin-top:36px;color:#000;cursor:pointer}.story-container div{display:inline-block}.story-container .story-desc{display:inline-flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:space-between;width:70%;height:100px;padding:8px}.story-container .story-title{margin-top:8px;margin-bottom:8px;display:block;font-size:18px;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2em}.story-container .story-img{height:100px;width:30%;border-radius:20%;overflow:hidden}.story-container .story-img img{height:100%;border-radius:20%}.story-container .story-category{padding:4px 6px;font-weight:700;color:#dd2c00;background-color:#fbe9e7;border-radius:4px}.story-container .story-pub-date{padding:4px 8px}.story-container.top-story{flex-direction:column-reverse}.story-container.top-story .story-desc{width:100%}.story-container.top-story .story-img{width:100%;height:200px;border-radius:8px}.story-container.top-story .story-img img{width:100%;margin:0 auto;display:block;border-radius:8px}.container-back{display:block;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;right:0;height:100%;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.22);z-index:3000}.full-story-container{width:95%;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;margin-top:48px;border-radius:8px}.full-story-container,.full-story-container .action-btn{padding:8px;background-color:#fff;box-shadow:0 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.14),0 3px 1px -2px rgba(0,0,0,.12),0 1px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.2)}.full-story-container .action-btn{position:absolute;top:0;right:0;margin-top:32px;margin-right:32px;height:36px;width:36px;font-size:18px;font-weight:200;border:none;border-radius:50%;color:#dd2c00}.full-story-container .action-btn:focus{outline:none}.full-story-container .action-btn:hover{color:#dd2c00}.full-story-container .story-title{margin:16px;display:block;font-size:24px;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2em}.full-story-container .story-img{height:300px;width:100%;border-radius:4px;overflow:hidden}.full-story-container .story-img img{height:100%;width:100%;border-radius:4px}.full-story-container .story-content{padding:16px 8px 8px;font-size:20px;line-height:24px;font-weight:300}.full-story-container .story-desc{margin:16px}.full-story-container .story-desc div{display:inline-block;padding:4px 8px;text-transform:capitalize}.full-story-container .story-desc div:first-of-type{font-weight:700;color:#dd2c00;background-color:#fbe9e7;border-radius:4px}.toast{position:fixed;top:60px;width:fit-content;font-weight:500;border-radius:4px;color:#dd2c00;background-color:#fff;box-shadow:0 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.14),0 3px 1px -2px rgba(0,0,0,.12),0 1px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.2);z-index:1000}#installBanner,.toast{display:none;left:0;right:0;margin:0 auto;padding:8px}#installBanner{position:absolute;top:400px;width:90%;background-color:#ffb847;border-radius:8px;box-shadow:0 4px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.14),0 1px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.12),0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0,0,0,.3)}#installBanner .banner-header{display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:center;align-items:center}#installBanner .brand-logo{height:100px;font-weight:700;color:#000;font-size:22px;align-items:center;cursor:pointer}#installBanner .brand-logo img{height:100%}#installBanner .tagline{display:inline-block;padding:8px;font-size:20px;font-weight:500;line-height:24px}#installBanner .user-choice{display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:flex-end}#installBanner button{padding:8px 16px;margin:8px;border:none;border-radius:8px;min-height:36px;color:#000;font-size:14px;font-weight:500;-webkit-appearance:none;background-color:initial;text-transform:uppercase}#installBanner button#installBtn{background-color:#fff}#installBanner button#cancel{border:1px solid #fff;background:none;font-weight:400}@media only screen and (max-width:992px){nav .brand-logo{display:flex;padding-left:16px}}@media only screen and (min-width:992px){.app-container{width:90%;margin:0 auto}.story-container{width:30%;margin-left:16px;margin-right:16px}.stories-group{display:flex;flex-direction:row;flex-wrap:wrap}}footer{padding:16px 16px 8px}footer .copyright{font-size:1.4em;font-weight:700;text-align:center}footer .disclaimer{text-align:center;color:#90a4ae}
